content: this is a pattern for quick to make eyeballs that you can use as table or hanging décors stress toys keychains etc and for the unafraid christmas tree balls with the indicated hook and yarn sizes the eyeball will be approximately 5 -7 cm big difficulty beginner with knowledge of basic crochet stitches magic_ring color changes straight stitches materials 1 yarn worsted red heart super saver 2 crochet hook 2 5mm-3mm 3 lightweight red yarn or red embroidery thread 4 tapestry needle 5 fiberfill
